stu_flirty: ^I step off the deck, still feeling the tension on my skin.
^Stu flutters down from, pretending like he didn't just watfh the whole thing.
^"Squaak - are you trying to seduce the ship's armoury?"
^"She flirted back...I think. Or maybe she threatened to set me on fire? Honestly, I'm not sure."
^, and apparently a type. An intense, terrifying type."
^"She's sharp, focused - she makes me want to be a better Captain."
^"Are you cream? Because you're whipped. Just make sure if he kisses you, it isn't followed by stabbing."
^Stu whistles as he flutter by my side. The deck is quiet again, yet I can feel her lingering stare.
^The wind picks up, the ship never gives you calm after a storm.
stu_disinterested: ^I step away from the deck, she didn't watch me go and I didn't look back.
^Some people build walkks to protect others, Ravynn builds them to make sure no one tries.
^"Squaak - well she's frostier than an iceberg."
^"She wanted solitude, I gave it to her."
^"I'm not here to get people to open up, Stu. If she wants to be a fortress, she can."
^Stu's quiet for once, just watching the sea with me. It's just like her, unpredictable and unforgiving.
^...even strong ships need care. Otherwise they sink and take everyone with them."
^I don't reply but rather grip tighter on the railing. Because he's right, and because I'm tired of things sinking.
